# Role Handoff Checklist

Use this checklist to ensure a clean, complete handoff between roles at key project transitions. Fill it out collaboratively by the outgoing and incoming role owners.

---

## Handoff Details

- **From role:**
- **To role:**
- **Project / initiative:**
- **Handoff date:**
- **Handoff reason:** (e.g., phase transition, personnel change, scope expansion)

---

## Context & Background

- [ ] Problem statement and project goals shared
- [ ] Key decisions and rationale documented (e.g., decision log or ADR)
- [ ] Stakeholder map and communication plan reviewed
- [ ] Current risks and open blockers identified
- [ ] Relevant links provided (project board, repo, design files, docs)

---

## Artifacts & Deliverables

- [ ] All deliverables for current phase are listed and status confirmed
- [ ] In-progress work items are documented with clear next steps
- [ ] Open pull requests reviewed and ownership transferred if needed
- [ ] Documentation updated to reflect current state

---

## Relationships & Communication

- [ ] Key contacts introduced (stakeholders, partner teams, vendors)
- [ ] Recurring meetings or sync cadences transferred
- [ ] Pending decisions or approvals flagged
- [ ] Escalation paths explained
